Moe school swimsuit, combination 10-piece set (Navy blue, Women)

A 10-piece set featuring 2 navy blue swimsuits, 2 navy blue swimsuits with sailor school uniform, 2 navy blue swimsuits with light blue over the knee socks, 2 navy blue swimsuits with sailor school uniform and over the knee socks, pigtails held with a red hair comb and light blue feet for the over the knee socks.
Defensive Strength: ★
Youth Level: ★★~★★★
This set includes the following items:

- Long fringe and pigtails (Red hair comb, Women) (Head)
- School swimsuit, former type (Navy blue, Women) (Combination)
- School swimsuit, new type (Navy blue, Women) (Combination)
- School swimsuit, former type + over the knee socks (Navy blue + light blue, Women) (Combination)
- School swimsuit, new type + over the knee socks (Navy blue + light blue, Women) (Combination)
- Sailor school uniform & school swimsuit, former type (Navy blue, Women) (Combination)
- Sailor school uniform & school swimsuit, new type (Navy blue, Women) (Combination)
- Sailor school uniform & school swimsuit, former type + over the knee socks (Navy blue + light blue, Women) (Combination)
- Sailor school uniform & school swimsuit, new type + over the knee socks (Navy blue + light blue, Women) (Combination)
- Over the knee socks foot colour (Light blue, Women) (Feet)

* Upon purchase, each item will be added to the applicable category.[#Legal]
